name: Samoan
description:
You pilot the Samoan, a prototype aircraft capable of drawing sigils to rain death on your enemies. Mechanics roughly based on Simoun.

Instructions: Check the in-game tutorial and manual.

Note: When I tested in WINE the audio was garbled. I was able to test it on a real Windows machine and it ran fine, but if you get any audio issues please report them.

OSX build is experimental as I don't have an apple machine to test it on.
